entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Forillon (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
